hero.subtitle: Your Partner in Digital Branding
hero.title: Visual {br} Identity in {br} Marrakech
hero.description: At Group Digital Concept, an expert agency in visual identity creation in Marrakech, we transform your vision into a captivating digital narrative.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.desc: We start every collaboration with an in-depth consultation. We discuss your needs, goals, and challenges to fully understand your project. This step is crucial for establishing a solid foundation for the future.

steps.title: Audit and Analysis
steps.desc: Technical and creative analysis of your current positioning. We identify strengths and weaknesses to build a visual identity strategy that surpasses your competitors.

steps.title: Action Plan Development
steps.desc: Precise definition of the creative roadmap. Choice of colors, typography, and strategic supports to ensure maximum consistency across all your touchpoints.

steps.title: Execution and Follow-up
steps.desc: Production of deliverables and deployment of your new identity. We remain by your side to adjust and optimize the visual impact of your brand over the long term.

items.name: Nadia El Fakir
items.text: A serious and competent agency. Their team designed a smooth and secure e-commerce site for our online store. Very satisfied with the work!

items.name: Amine Tazi
items.text: We called on them to manage our online advertising campaigns. Their targeted approach significantly improved our return on investment.

items.name: Salma Bennani
items.text: Thanks to Group Digital Concept, our social networks are more dynamic and professional. They know how to create engaging content adapted to our audience.

items.name: Anas Rachidi
items.text: Top-notch technical service! They optimized our IT systems and set up reliable backup solutions. A real relief for our company.

items.name: Fatima Zahra El Idrissi
items.text: We called on them for our visual identity. Their creativity and professionalism helped give a strong and consistent image to our brand.

faq.title: Explore the {br} Frequent questions.
faq.description: Do you have questions about digital content creation? Our expert team is here to enlighten you.

items.question: What types of digital content do you offer?
items.answer: We create blog articles, social media posts, promotional videos, infographics, newsletters, and product sheets, all optimized for SEO and adapted to your audience.

items.question: How long does it take to produce quality content?
items.answer: The time depends on the complexity of the project. On average, a social media content pack takes 5 to 7 days, while a full editorial strategy may require 2 weeks.

items.question: Do you integrate SEO into your content?
items.answer: Absolutely. Every text produced by GDC is semantically optimized to meet search engine requirements while remaining natural and engaging for the user.

items.question: Do you offer tailor-made content strategies?
items.answer: Yes, we never use generic templates. Every strategy is built after an in-depth analysis of your market, target audience, and conversion goals.

items.question: Can you manage our content on social networks?
items.answer: Yes, our Social Media department can handle planning, visual creation, writing, and interaction with your community on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and TikTok.

items.question: What are your rates for digital content creation?
items.answer: Our rates are flexible and adapted to the size of your project. We offer monthly packages for regular support or a la carte rates for occasional needs.

items.question: How do you measure content effectiveness?
items.answer: We use advanced analytics tools to track reach, engagement, click-through rate, and most importantly, the conversions generated by each piece of content produced.

items.question: Do you work with local companies in Marrakech?
items.answer: Marrakech is our operational base. We know the local economic landscape and the expectations of clients in the region perfectly, which allows us to be ultra-relevant.

items.question: What business sectors do you cover?
items.answer: We have cross-cutting expertise: Hotels & Riads, Luxury Real Estate, E-commerce, B2B Services, and Medical. Each sector benefits from an adapted tone and style.

items.question: Do you guarantee the originality of the content?
items.answer: That's our #1 promise. All our content is created from scratch by our experts, guaranteeing no plagiarism and total respect for your intellectual property.

contact.title: Innovative Web Agency & {br} Digital Communication
contact.p1: We are not just a digital marketing agency. We support companies with tailor-made solutions to boost their online presence and maximize their impact.
contact.p2: Based in Morocco, we combine local expertise and international trends to offer high-performance strategies adapted to each project.

success.title: Request Received!
success.text: Thank you for your trust. {br} Our experts will contact you within 24 hours.
